content.p: The Division of Biomedical Sciences is a fantastic place to build an independent scientific career working alongside scientists who have extensive experience and knowledge in their field of expertise. We are a group of researchers whose interests lie in a wide range of non-communicable and infectious diseases, as well as in pedagogy in Science teaching. We welcome multi- and inter-disciplinary collaboration from both inside and outside the University regarding research or teaching. Find out about our work in the Division, including research groups, research interests, current projects, collaborations and publications. UNM Research Study for an MPhil/PhD in Biomedical Sciences telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
